articles.description:
Re 2/ A few tests have been made before the protocol switches from PoW to PoS, here is a breakdown of them:
1. Hive tests are used to test the new engine APIs
2. Kurtosis helps spin up staging networks which are testing environments to isolate specific aspects of the Merge
